title: Aromatherapy
author: Sandhiya Ramaswamy
cleaned_text: and Mudras for Emotional Healing and Balance While there are many ways to find harmony, essential oils and mudras (hand positions) have been used for hundreds of years in Ayurveda health regimens to help balance your emotions. Here are seven aromatherapy oils paired with a mudra to create a full week worth of centering practices.
